description: Waxholm Space atlas of the rat brain, expanded with detailed delineations of 13 hippocampal and parahippocampal region (79 structures total).

publications.citation: Kjonigsen LJ, Lillehaug S, Bjaalie JG, Witter MP, Leergaard TB (2015) Waxholm Space atlas of the rat brain hippocampal region: Three-dimensional delineations based on magnetic resonance and diffusion tensor imaging. NeuroImage 108, 441-449
